mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MATE ( NO, activityname, writer, meetingplace, meetingtime, meetingdate, peoplenum, peoplemaxnum, startzone, endzone, starttime, endtime, content, regdate, image, regular) values(#{no},#{activityname},#{writer},#{meetingplace},#{meetingtime},(to_date(#{meetingdate} 23:59:59),1,#{peoplemaxnum}, #{startzone},#{endzone},#{starttime},#{endtime},#{content},sysdate,#{image},#{regular})
